title: Soviet X-Files show 'jellyfish' UFO hovered above Russian city in the 1980s
description: Newly released archive of Soviet-era documents details aerial phenomena reported as well as other close encounters

title: Soviets ran secret investigation into glowing 'jellyfish' UFO seen above Russian city
description: USSR's own X-Files also collected eye-witness reports of humanoid figures tied to unexplained lights in the sky

title: Soviet-Era UFO Documents Released by Journalist Claim Giant 'Jellyfish-Shaped' Craft Sightings
description: Soviet-era UFO files released by journalist George Knapp detail Cold War sightings, including a 'jellyfish-shaped' craft, without confirming extraterrestrial claims.

title: Steven Spielberg Clarifies His Surprising Stance on Aliens Ahead of UFO Movie
description: In the build-up to his next directorial venture, Disclosure Day, which once again deals with extraterrestrial beings, Steven Spielberg has shared his views on whether the concept of aliens is fact or myth. The visionary filmmaker, who is currently occupied with promoting his upcoming film, revealed that he has always been fascinated by what’s out [...]The post Steven Spielberg Clarifies His Surprising Stance on Aliens Ahead of UFO Movie appeared first on Mandatory.

title: Nuclear Missile Guard Claims Chilling UFO Abduction and 'Non Human' Encounter at US Base
description: Former Air Force guard Richard Barth alleges four mysterious entities froze him and revealed shocking truths during a Cold War era encounter.
